Les types de ressources

{{ type.title }}

{{ type.description }}

import { Component, OnInit, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { TypeService } from 'src/app/Services/type/type.service'; import { Type } from '../../../DTO/type' @Component({ selector: 'app-resource-type', templateUrl: './resource-type.component.html', styleUrls: ['./resource-type.component.scss'] }) export class ResourceTypeComponent implements OnInit { @Input() types: Type[] = []; constructor(private typeService: TypeService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.fetchTypes(); } fetchTypes(): void { this.typeService.getTypes().subscribe(types => { this.types = types; }); } }
